home.AboutContent: As a second-year student at ENIGMA school, I am looking for an apprenticeship in network administration to start my career in this field. My long-term goal is to specialize in network security, a domain that particularly interests me. I aim to first acquire solid experience in network infrastructure management as well as system configuration. Highly motivated and autonomous, I am ready to bring my technical skills to a dynamic IT team.
home.DevelopmentContent: I am versatile in software development, with projects ranging from system programming to dynamic web applications.
home.ReseauContent: My training has given me solid expertise in computer networks, along with practical skills in configuration, management, and troubleshooting.
home.BDDContent: I am proficient in database management with SQL and NoSQL, including design, maintenance, and optimization to ensure performance and data integrity.
home.SportContent: I currently practice weightlifting and am passionate about rugby, which I played in my youth. These activities have helped me develop discipline, endurance, and team spirit.
home.StapsContent: Associate's Degree in Sports Training, specializing in rugby
home.Project1Description: Creation of a blog dedicated to computer networks, featuring articles on protocols, equipment, and technologies.
home.Project2Description: Development of a CRUD application in PHP with a MySQL database to manage a user list.
home.Project3Description: Development of a CRM application using Next.js, integrated with a MySQL database and deployed on an OVH server to manage customer data during my internship.
home.Project4Description: Development of a brick breaker game in C using the SDL library, as part of a school project.
